name: Personal Finance Tracker Spreadsheet
description: Tracking your personal finances is now easy with the help of this simple and easy-to-use Personal Finance Tracker Spreadsheet.Be in control of your finances and find out where your money goes ðŸ’°With simple 2 steps follow strategy its easy to assess your overall financial situation at any given point of time.Salient Features: Simple Click and Use Interface with only 3 tabs to manage your personal finances, even for an absolute beginner. Addition of own Income and Expense accounts along with specif
features: Simple Click and Use Interface with only 3 tabs to manage your personal finances, even for an absolute beginner.; Addition of own Income and Expense accounts along with specifying your Income Goals and Budgeted Expenses for12 months.; Monthly OverviewofIncome,ExpensesandSummaryof all accounts showing how you performed during the period.; IncomeandExpenses Overviewthat is updated based on the period filtered for use by user.; Entire template is built on3 tabs, and is controllable with the help of only3 filtersprovided by the user.; Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Add as many of your ownIncomeandExpensesaccounts and set yourIncome GoalsandBudgeted Expensesfor the 12 months period in no time.; Add inIncomeandExpensedetails as per the Accounts added earlier.; Assess yourmonthlyoryearly Income and Expensesfor each of the accounts or all accounts in total in a simple and easy to useDashboardsection.
